Introduction: Hello! You must be @, the new farmer. I'm Caroline.#$e#My husband runs the general store here. And have you met my daughter, Luny? She's the pale one with the purple hair.
AcceptBirthdayGift_Positive: Thanks, sweetie. That's very kind of you to remember my birthday.$h
AcceptBirthdayGift_Negative: Oh... is that... a birthday gift? I see... well, thanks for stopping by.$a
AcceptGift_(O)StardropTea: Ooohh... this is nice. I'll save it for a quiet day in the sunroom.
AcceptGift_(O)16: Oh, you've been foraging! Thank you!#$b#I'll make a spicy cocktail sauce with this. That'll put some hair on Pierre's chest.$h
cropMatured_815: I noticed you're growing tea on your farm. Make sure to bring me a cup!$h
dating_Abigail_memory_oneday: Luny told me that you and her are seeing each other. That's sweet!
GreenRain: I've never seen green rain before... It must not be too dangerous if you made it here!
GreenRain_2: Ah, the special rain is back! This year, I'm going to make the most of it!#$e#This calls for a cup of green tea!$h
movieTheater_memory_oneweek: It's fun to have a movie theater in town. I want to go see a western!
married_Abigail: I'm so happy for you two! Welcome to the family!$h
wonGrange: Pierre's trying to play it cool, but he's seething about losing to you at the Stardew Valley Fair.
married_memory_oneweek: Ah, the newlywed. So, how was the honeymoon?#$e#I see. Well, I guess the farm would wither if you took time away...
eventSeen_719926: Are you feeling relaxed? I bet...
houseUpgrade_1: $y 'I heard you got a new kitchen! Think you'll be doing a lot of cooking?_I plan to!_It's a good skill to have. And with all those fresh ingredients on your farm, you'll be sitting pretty!_Nah, it's just for looks_I see. Well, don't forget to eat right... nutrition is important.'
achievement_15: Judging by the savory smells wafting from your place, I can tell you've been busy in the kitchen!$h
Resort_Entering: Willy gave us each a piece of his fish jerky. I'm still chewing on it.
Resort_Shore: The water is so warm here compared to the valley. It's really pleasant!
Resort_Bar: I told Gus to surprise me, and he made an iced green tea with mango zest. How nice!$h
Resort: Hi @. Are you here to relax, or to do work?
Mon: I wish Luny wouldn't spend so much time in her room.
Mon_inlaw_Abigail: Hi, @. Are you enjoying the married life? I hope so!
Mon8: #$1 Caroline23#When we first moved to Pelican Town I would take secret walks to the Wizard's tower. Don't tell Pierre, he has jealousy issues.#$e#Luny was born about a year after we moved to Pelican Town. I wonder if she'll ever experience life outside the valley?
Tue: I've seen wild horesradish in the forest.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
Wed: Hi there. Do you have everything you need for the farm?#$e#If not, we might be able to help you out.#$e#We carry a variety of useful items.
Thu: #$1 Caroline1#Hmmm... I wonder if I can get Pierre to cook dinner tonight.#$e#Hmmm... what am I going to make for dinner tonight?#$e#Maybe I'll just get take-out from the Saloon.
Fri: It's a fine-looking day.#$e#On days like this I like to help Evelyn with the public gardens.#$e#She's strong for her age, but I think she appreciates all the help she can get.
Sat: Is it just me, or does Luny have an unhealthy interest in doom and gloom?#$e#Maybe I'm just too old to understand.
Sat_inlaw_Abigail: Dinner's been a lot quieter since Luny moved out...#$e#No, not because she used to chew with her mouth open!$h
Sat2: Luny's always had a strange interest in the occult. I'm not sure where she gets it from...
Sat4: Luny's always had a strange interest in the occult. I'm not sure where she gets it from...
Sat6: #$1 Caroline12#When we first moved here, I took a while to settle down... I wasn't ready for the domestic life.#$e#Pierre's a bit traditional... but he's a good man. He's ambitious, but he always puts his family first.
Sun: Today I'm just going to relax and think positively.#$e#Do you ever take a day off?
Wed6: Stardew Valley is nice, but I wish I knew more people.#$e#I'm glad that we've become friends.
summer_Mon: On wednesdays the shop is closed.#$e#Keep that in mind if you're going to need anything.
summer_Tue: I've been seeing wild fruits in the forest lately.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
summer_Wed: Hi there. Do you have everything you need for the farm?#$e#If not, we might be able to help you out.#$e#We carry a variety of useful items.
summer_Sat: Is it just me, or does Luny look a little pale?#$e#Maybe I'm just worrying about her too much.
summer_Sat_inlaw_Abigail: How's Luny's health? She's always been such a pale girl. Hopefully the farm lifestyle puts a little color in her cheeks.
summer_Sun: Today I'm just going to relax and think positively.#$e#Do you ever take a day off?
summer_Wed6: Time seems to go by faster and faster the older you get...$s
fall_Mon: Fall is Luny's favorite season, so I'm hoping she'll come out of her room more often.
fall_Mon_inlaw_Abigail: Luny was taking online classes here, but I don't think her heart was really in it...#$e#She's a free spirit, like I was before I met Pierre. She's probably having the time of her life on your farm.
fall_Tue: I've seen edible mushrooms in the forest.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
fall_Sat: Is it just me, or does Luny play too many video games?#$e#Maybe I'm a little old-fashioned.
fall_Wed6: You know, I used to want to be a farmer myself. Well, more like a rancher.#$e#I always loved movies about the wild west when I was a girl.
winter_Tue: Winter is harsh, but you can dig up some roots if you're lucky.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
winter_Fri: Even though it's cold, I still check on the public garden beds every now and then.#$e#I just want to make sure they aren't damaged too much before spring returns.
winter_Sat: Don't you think Luny would look better with her natural hair color?#$e#She used to have light chestnut-colored hair.
winter_Wed6: Are you excited for the new year?#$e#I predict that you'll be super-successful on your farm.$h
